page.title: 13RAILWAY
page.content: A mainline railway runs through our area. It starts in London at Waterloo station and comes through Devon and on to Cornwall. The nearest station to Kilmington is Axminster. After that, it goes to Honiton, Feniton and Exeter. The price from Axminster to London is Â£16.50 for an adult and Â£7.80 for a child (return). The price from Axminster to Exeter is Â£3.20 for an adult and Â£1.60 for a child (return). There are fewer trains now than there used to be, and they do not stop at Seaton Junction any more. There are no stopping points in our grid squares; the trains just travel through the area. On the fast, inter-city trains, it takes about three hours to get to London.
